name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Malicious Script Execution
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious PowerShell commands to exfiltrate sensitive data from the company's network.

action--c10d7f7d-b12c-43f1-95c1-b1c1b707.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--c10d7f7d-b12c-43f1-95c1-b1c1b707.description: Terminate any running PowerShell process that could be executing malicious commands.

action--3eb0dadb-1c1e-4f03-a7b2-589832bb.name: Delete dropped malicious script
action--3eb0dadb-1c1e-4f03-a7b2-589832bb.description: Remove the malicious PowerShell script that was dropped on the host.

loop--14a02bc7-fa65-4407-9a2d-8147fe0e02.name: Scan for Additional Threats
loop--14a02bc7-fa65-4407-9a2d-8147fe0e02.description: Scan the host for additional threats and repeat until the system is confirmed clean.

action--14a02bc7-fa65-4407-9a2d-8147fe0e.name: Run threat scan
action--14a02bc7-fa65-4407-9a2d-8147fe0e.description: Perform a scan of the host for additional threats using ClamAV.
